column4: Something is spanking my HDD. Anyone know of a 'top'-like programme for seeing what it is?
atop might give you some info..
Hey. Nice. Just installed and ran as root. seems to give me info about read/write/io etc. but not which process is associated with it... Might be some more options I can look into. Thanks.
you're welcome.. I don't know of any other tool that gives info on hard drive activity.. hope you find what you're looking for
